meanings.definition: The act of making something sweet.
meanings.sent1: I added sweetenings to the cake batter to make it taste better.
meanings.sent2: The sweetenings in the tea made it delicious.
meanings.sent3: The sweetenings sprinkled on the cookies turned them into a delightful treat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like sweetenings, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sweetenings in the air hinted at the upcoming festival.

meanings.definition: Substances used to make food or drink sweet.
meanings.sent1: The sugar and honey are common sweetenings in recipes.
meanings.sent2: She added sweetenings to the lemonade to enhance the flavor.
meanings.sent3: The sweetenings in the pantry tempted her to bake a cake.
meanings.sent4: His words were like sweetenings, making her day brighter.
meanings.sent5: The sweetenings in the dessert made it irresistible.

meanings.definition: Something that makes a situation more pleasant or enjoyable.
meanings.sent1: Kind words are sweetenings that can improve any conversation.
meanings.sent2: The laughter of children is one of life's sweetenings.
meanings.sent3: Her presence was like sweetenings, bringing joy to the gathering.
meanings.sent4: Music can be the sweetenings that elevate a dull day.
meanings.sent5: The sweetenings of friendship make life richer.
